text: A Local Community Team, or LoCo Team, is a group of local Linux advocates. The main focus of a LoCo team is to advocate the use of the Linux operating system as well as the use of open source/free software products. ==Ubuntu & LoCos== The Ubuntu OS receives the credit for the promotion of the use of LoCos. They provide an assortment of materials and media to help each LoCo with their goals. ==Approved LoCo Teams== ==New LoCo Teams== Cyprus ==See also== * Linux User Group * Ubuntu Community Council * Jono Bacon -- Ubuntu Community Manager ==External links== * Ubuntu LoCo List * Ubuntu LoCo Main * Ubuntu LoCo Howto * Ubuntu LoCo FAQ * Ubuntu LoCo List (Wiki) * Ubuntu tries to go LoCo in all 50 states Category:Linux user groups ru:Группа пользователей Linux#LoCo
title: LoCo team
